comments.author: stupidnoodle.6820
comments.body:
Hello!

I was wondering if there is a way to obtain historical data of the trading post from the GW2 API (I’m interested in past prices of items). I am interested in using it for a pet project

Apologies if there is an obvious answer – this is my first time playing around with the GW2 API so I may not know the proper place to look in the documentation.

Many thanks and have a nice day!
